Vitamins
You should be able to get all 
the vitamins and minerals you 
need by eating a varied and 
balanced diet. While you are 
breastfeeding (just as when 
you were pregnant) you should 
take supplements containing 
10 micrograms (mcg) of 
vitamin D each day. Your skin 
makes vitamin D naturally 
when it’s exposed to the sun 
between April and September.
